body.p: Disclosure of Accounting Policies, issued in February 2021, amended paragraphs 7, 10, 114, 117 and 122, added paragraphs 117Aâ€“117E and deleted paragraphs 118, 119 and 121. It also amended IFRS Practice Statement 2 Making Materiality Judgements. An entity shall apply the amendments to IAS 1 for annual reporting periods beginning on or after 1 January 2023. Earlier application is permitted. If an entity applies those amendments for an earlier period, it shall disclose that fact.
